attributes.action: Make private disabled parking bay for the resident only.
attributes.additional_details: As a disabled persons, parking at home can even with a disabled parking bay be very frustrating when your intended bay is used by anyone who has a blue badge. Which can and is abused by people using private disabled bay to park and walk to the shop.
attributes.background: Restrict private disabled parking bay to the intended personal vehicle's only.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about whether to grant a dedicated parking bay for a disabled resident are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
